thread.title: ‘Crazy’ for you: A stalker musical sitcom
thread.title_full: ‘Crazy’ for you: A stalker musical sitcom - San Francisco Chronicle

author: David Wiegand
title: ‘Crazy’ for you: A stalker musical sitcom
text:
Photo: Eddy Chen, Associated Press Rachel Bloom plays Rebecca Bunch, a high-powered New York attorney who moves to California to chase after a romantic interest from summer camp in “Crazy Ex Girlfriend.” Rachel Bloom plays Rebecca Bunch, a high-powered New York attorney...
“Crazy Ex-Girlfriend” is an odd duck — a musical sitcom about a young woman obsessed with getting her old boyfriend back. Rachel Bloom plays Rebecca Bunch, a high-powered New York attorney who moves to California to chase after a romantic interest from summer camp in “Crazy Ex Girlfriend.” Rachel Bloom plays Rebecca Bunch, a high-powered New York attorney...
“Crazy Ex-Girlfriend” is an odd duck — a musical sitcom about a young woman obsessed with getting her old boyfriend back.
